title: Typophile | Typographic Collaboration
content:
## [Picture perfect letters](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023161621/http:/typophile.com/node/50721 "Picture perfect letters")

After seeing what [Dan Tobin Smith](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023161621/http:/www.dantobinsmith.com/) was able to do with random, everyday objects (aka junk), Iâ€™ll definitely be thinking twice before throwing anything away.
